channel.title: also on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in also on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-04
item.description: Samsung Galaxy A53 leak leaves little to the imagination with official-looking renders, specs (2 minute read) Details on Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy A53 have been leaked.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-14
item.description: The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience’ Hits PS5 and Xbox Series X/S (1 minute read) Epic Games has released The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience, a tech demo with ultra-realistic visuals and open-world environments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-13
item.description: Nvidia Reveals Its CEO Was Computer Generated in Keynote Speech (2 minute read) Nvidia’s GTC conference in April featured a keynote presentation by its CEO Jensen Huang.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-03
item.description: Ask Me Anything (TLDR AMA) Hey guys, I am doing an ongoing ask me anything as the first TLDR AMA.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-19
item.description: Google’s Project Starline is a ‘magic window’ for 3D telepresence (1 minute read) Google’s Project Starline uses a combination of specialized hardware and computer vision technology to create life-sized 3D images of people.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-10
item.description: McDonald’s confirms creation of McPlant plant-based burger, unveils new Crispy Chicken Sandwich will debut in 2021 (6 minute read) McDonald’s announced a new plant-based burger and a new Crispy Chicken Sandwich during its virtual investor update on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-23
item.description: FDA approves remdesivir to treat COVID-19 (3 minute read) The FDA has approved remdesivir as a treatment for COVID-19 in hospitalized patients.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-08
item.description: The Supreme Court hears Oracle v. Google tomorrow—here’s what’s at stake (7 minute read) Oracle v.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-13
item.description: Samsung’s 5G Galaxy Z Flip may have been fully revealed in these latest leaks (2 minute read) A leaked video of the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5G handset suggests that the device might be revealed at Samsung’s upcoming August 5th Galaxy Unpacked event.
